svg.content: <mxfile modified="2019-08-25T00:05:29.873Z" host="www.draw.io" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_4) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/76.0.3809.100 Safari/537.36" etag="xpg76q-F2Q4TVlQe89iZ" pages="1" version="11.2.2" type="google"><diagram name="Page-1" id="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 54px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
updates his
Facebook Status
(types a clear
message)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
listen post new msg event
encrypt msg with bob secret
replace clear msg by encrypted msg just before post new status

switch.text:
listen post new msg event
encrypt msg with bob secret
replace clear msg by encrypted msg just before post new status

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 102px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 60px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 54px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 54px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
loads html
page with
encrypted
Facebook status

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
parse html
decrypt msg
replace it in html

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 102px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
hey, here is my secret key that allows you
to decode my facebook messages

switch.text:
hey, here is my secret key that allows you
 to decode my facebook messages

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 290px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
STEP 1
Bob sends a transaction to Alice on Ethereum Mainnet
The data transaction contains a secret.
The secret is encrypted with the Alice pub key
ECIES (Elliptic Curve Integrated Encryption Scheme)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 216px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
STEP 2
Before sending his message to Facebook, bob encrypts it with his secret

switch.text:
STEP 2
Before sending his message to Facebook, bob encrypts it with his secret

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 700px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-style: italic; text-align: center;
div.div: Omertà: Add a Privacy Feature on top of Facebook, Twitter, ... Thanks to Ethereum Network!

switch.text: Omertà: Add a Privacy Feature on top of Facebook, Twitter, ... Thanks to Ethereum Network!

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 216px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
STEP 3
Alice retrieves the transaction from Bob (STEP 1)
The data of this transaction contains the encrypted Bob decode key
Alice decrypt the Bob decode key with her private key
Alice decode the Bob message with bob decode key
